page.title: 01Blockley, a general picture
page.content: Blockley is well known for the outstanding beauty of its countryside and the extensive walks that are available in the surrounding area. Most of the property in Blockley is built from Cotswold stone and there is a fairly large Council House Estate on the outskirts of the village. There are many weekend cottages used by holiday makers and accomodation is plentiful. There are many old silk mills that have now been converted into private housing and most of the shops are to be found along the very narrow High Street. The village is steeped in history and is centrally situated to give acces to the many surrounding places of interest.
